name: Tenable.io
description: Search for assets in Tenable.io by IP Address, Domain or CVE and view vulnerability information.

options.name: Tenable.io API URL
options.description: The URL of the Tenable.io API instance you would like to connect to (including http:// or https://)

options.name: Access Key
options.description: The Tenable.io access key generated in Tenable io user dashboard. For more information see https://docs.tenable.com/tenableio/Content/Platform/Settings/MyAccount/GenerateAPIKey.htm

options.name: Secret Key
options.description: The Tenable.io secret key generated in the Tenable.io user dashboard.

options.name: Filter Assets by Vulnerability Severity
options.description: Only return assets that have at least one vulnerability at or above the selected severity.  For example, if "High" is selected, only assets with a "High" or "Critical" vulnerability will be returned from searches. Defaults to "No Filtering".
